name: Action Scene
Prompt: Place the person in the photo in a cinematic action scene

name: Superheros
Prompt: Transform the people in the picture into superheroes with capes and costumes.

name: Vintage
Prompt: Convert the image to have a vintage sepia tone filter from the 1920s era.

name: Fantasy World
Prompt: Place the people from the picture in a magical fantasy world with dragons and castles.

name: Cartoon
Prompt: Transform the people in the picture into animated cartoon characters.

name: Professional
Prompt: Make the people in the picture look like business professionals in a corporate setting.

name: Beach Vacation
Prompt: Place the people from the picture on a tropical beach with palm trees and ocean waves.

name: Winter Wonderland
Prompt: Place the people from the picture in a snowy winter landscape with falling snowflakes.

name: Cyberpunk
Prompt: Transform the people and setting into a futuristic cyberpunk world with neon lights.

name: Pet Addition
Prompt: Add cute pets like dogs or cats next to the people in the picture.
